title_full: HCIPER01-BP01 Use multiple solutions for performance optimization
title: Use multiple solutions for performance optimization
description: The optimal solution for a particular workload varies, and solutions often combine multiple approaches. Well-Architected healthcare workloads use multiple solutions and enable different features to improve performance. Take a data-driven approach to selecting a high-performance architecture and gather data on all aspects of the architecture.
outcome: Healthcare workloads achieve optimal performance by leveraging multiple AWS services and features tailored to their specific requirements.
